sentence.Network_en: The harass-ment had become too much to tolerate and he decided to move out.
sentence.Network_cn: 骚扰越来越过分，他难以忍受，决定搬走。

sentence.Network_en: He has sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他委派大批的官员到这里骚扰我们的人民。

sentence.Network_en: Our mission is to harass the landing of the main Japaness expeditionary force.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的任务是骚乱日本远征军主力的登陆.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... harangue 长篇指责性演说 harass 侵扰，烦忧 harbinger 先驱，先兆.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... bypass 规避，绕过 harass 烦扰 cuirass 胸甲，护胸铁甲.
英文沙龙 ... retreat 撤退,隐居 harass 使烦恼,不断骚扰 outfox 以机智胜过.
2012年3月28日 - the government would reconsider its new 0.3% excise tax on unbranded gold jewellery because it did not want to harass(使困扰) the industry.

list.abs: 1.言语的骚扰（verbal harassment）：在言语中带有贬抑任一性别的意味，包括带有性意涵、性别偏见或歧视行为及态度，甚或带有 …
1. 性别骚扰（gender Harassment）：包括一切强化「女性是次等性别」印象的一切言行，以及传达侮辱、诋毁、或性别歧视观念的 …
退款 refund恶性骚扰 malicious harassment网店 online shop
留学新西兰学... ... 骚扰与歧视 Harassment and discrimination 50 种族歧视 Racial Harassment 50 性骚扰 Sexual Harassment 51.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French harasser, from harer 'set a dog on', from Germanic hare, a cry urging a dog to attack

entry.def: If someone harasses you, they trouble or annoy you, for example by attacking you repeatedly or by causing you as many problems as they can.

example.ex: A woman reporter complained one of them sexually harassed her in the locker room...
example.tran: 一名女记者投诉说，他们中有一人在更衣室里对她进行性骚扰。

example.ex: We are almost routinely harassed by the police.
example.tran: 警方几乎隔三差五地就找我们的麻烦。

sentences.sentence: "He is known to harry his staff when he is overworked"

auth_sentence.content: Russian officials say they are not trying to harass foreign workers.

sentences.en: The court ordered him to stop harassing his ex-wife.
sentences.cn: 法庭命令他不得再骚扰前妻。
